text: Hi All! What kind of site monitoring systems do y'all use? Wondering if there are any "HubSpot friendly"solutions which my team & I can leverage, as we're brainstorming what we can implement for monitoring our sites in real-time
<@UJ7FCC734> what type of monitoring are you wanting to do, uptime, analytics, heatmapping, error tracking etc?

<@U7SL518D6> - mainly uptime monitoring and error tracking. Ideal scenario - a landing page goes down, and our slack channel is notified, so, we can work on a fix asap without much damage to conversions
we use pingdom for that, there is also uptime robot
we have a devops channel and pingdom reports downed sites to that channel for us
